name: Sands (itch)
description:
The mystical timekeeper totem has been stolen from the sacred Temple of the Timekeeper. Chaos has struck and shaken the delicate fibers of the time space continuum. Your player character must solve puzzle platformer chambers within the temple to restore the timekeeper totem to its rightful place and thus restoring balance to the universe. 

The Temple of the Timekeeper contains many puzzle chambers leading to its most sacred pedestal chamber. The mystical timekeeper totem must be utilized to traverse the chambers within the temple before finally placing it to rest on the pedestal where it belongs.

Developed, Designed and Published by 6 students at the University of Alabama in Huntsville as a part of Team Game Design, Fall 2018 Course.
